title: Josh Xu
text: Josh Xu is a fourth-year undergraduate student studying Statistics and Data Science and Geography at UCLA. He is presently considering multiple offers from Ph.D. programs in Statistics. In his free time, Josh enjoys playing quiz bowl and is beginning an amateur career in political punditry. Download My CV

title: Progress, Priorities, and Obstacles to Providing Adequate Shade and Lighting at Bus Stops in Los Angeles
text:
PI: Monisha Reginald, UCLA Luskin School of Public Affairs
I performed data collection for a project examining the inequities of the rider experience at bus stops across Los Angeles, particularly for women and riders of color. I took measurements regarding street lighting and bus shelters, evaluating the potential for improvements.

title: Democrats, Data, and Determination: The Hidden Story of Donald Trump’s Return
text: My book about the 2024 election, in collaboration with the Presidential History Productions YouTube channel. The pre-publication manuscript can be downloaded here. I am still working out the details for official publication and release.
